column4: Hello can some1 help me with a mount problem ? (dual boot pc - same drives mount at desktop-ubuntu fine but on server-ubuntu they don't [ mount: special device /dev/sdc1 does not exist] the 2 that aren't working at server are connected at a pci-sata the other two working are connected to motherboard)
mount: special device /dev/sdc1 does not exist
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
